text: Me izɨ nguibar ekiar kam daboroghtɨ a isigham. Eghtɨ avir kam dɨpeniba bar dar isigham, dɨpenir kaba gumazamiziba faragha dagh isɨn ghuavanaga, ofan mɨgharir mughuriar aghuim zuiba aser Bal bagha dagh amua, wainɨn ofaba aser igharaziba bagha da inge. Ezɨ gumazamiziba amir arazir kaba na gamima kɨ bar anɨngaghe.
